snippet: Law officers surrounded and shot tear gas into a Montgomery house where they believe a man suspected in a deadly shooting Saturday near Auburn University may have fled.
abstract: Law officers surround and shoot tear gas into a Montgomery, Alabama, house where they believe Desmonte D Leonard, suspected of a shooting that left three people dead and three others wounded near Auburn University, may have fled.
lead_paragraph: Law officers surrounded and shot tear gas into a Montgomery house where they believe a man suspected in a deadly shooting Saturday near Auburn University may have fled.

headline.main: Alabama: House Swarmed in Search for Suspect
headline.print_headline: Alabama: House Swarmed in Search for Suspect
